'1/2-3/4' GAP ALONG BOTTOM OF BOTH FRONT DOORS .MUST MAKE DOORS TIGHT FITTING. | 39. CONTAMINATION PREVENTED DURING FOOD PREPARATION, STORAGE & DISPLAY - Comments: MUST PROVIDE A BARRIER TO PREVENT CUSTOMERS FROM ENTERING FRONT PREP/DISH WASHING AREA AND MAINTAIN.(PRIORITY FOUNDATION 7-38-005) | 44. UTENSILS, EQUIPMENT & LINENS: PROPERLY STORED, DRIED, & HANDLED - Comments: MUST INVERT MULTIUSE UTENSILS ON STORAGE SHELVES. | 45. SINGLE-USE/SINGLE-SERVICE ARTICLES: PROPERLY STORED & USED - Comments: MUST STORE PLASTIC WEAR WITH HANDLES IN UPRIGHT POSITION. | 47. FOOD & NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES CLEANABLE, PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED & USED - Comments: MUST REMOVE RUST FROM REAR MEAT DISPLAY SHELVING UNITS . | 47. FOOD & NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES CLEANABLE, PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED & USED - Comments: MUST REPLACE MISSING FAN GUARD COVER IN MILK WALK IN COOLER. | 47. FOOD & NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES CLEANABLE, PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED & USED - Comments: MUST ELIMINATE GROCERY BAGS USED FOR FOOD STORAGE AND PROVIDE FOOD GRADE BAGS. | 48. WAREWASHING FACILITIES: INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & USED; TEST STRIPS - Comments: OBSERVED NO CHEMICAL TEST KIT TO CHECK SANITIZING SOLUTION PPM'S.MUST PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN.(PRIORITY FOUNDATION 7-38-005) | 49. NON-FOOD/FOOD CONTACT SURFACES CLEAN - Comments: MUST CLEAN DUST BUILD UP ON CAN GOODS,DISPLAY SHELVES ON SALES FLOOR AND SERVICE COUNTER.MUST CLEAN DEBRIS BUILD UP ON POP SLEEVES IN COOLERS,PREP TABLES,SAW MACHINE,UNUSED EQUIPMENT,FAN GUARD COVERS IN WALK IN COOLERS. | 51. PLUMBING INSTALLED; PROPER BACKFLOW DEVICES - Comments: MUST REPAIR OR REPLACE LEAKY FAUCET AT REAR 3- COMPARTMENT SINK. | 53. TOILET FACILITIES: PROPERLY CONSTRUCTED, SUPPLIED, & CLEANED - Comments: MUST PROVIDE A GARBAGE CAN WITH LID IN TOILET ROOM. | 55. PHYSICAL FACILITIES INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & CLEAN - Comments: MUST REPAIR OR REPLACE DAMAGED AND BROKEN CONCRETE FLOOR IN VESTIBULE,PREP AREA.DAMAGED AND MISSING FLOOR TILES IN WALK IN COOLERS,PREP AREA,DISH WASHING AREAS,STORAGE AREAS,TOILET ROOM AND WHERE NEEDED.MUST REMOVE CARDBOARD FROM FLOOR BEHIND SERVICE COUNTER. | 55. PHYSICAL FACILITIES INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & CLEAN - Comments: MUST CLEAN DEBRIS BUILD UP FROM FLOOR UNDER DISPLAY SHELVES,PALLETS,WALK IN COOLERS,PREP AREAS AND ALL STORAGE AREAS. | 55. PHYSICAL FACILITIES INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & CLEAN - Comments: MUST CLEAN DEBRIS BUILD UP FROM WALLS AND CEILINGS IN ALL WALK IN COOLERS AND WHERE NEEDED. | 55. PHYSICAL FACILITIES INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & CLEAN - Comments: MUST CLEAN DUST BUILD UP FROM ALL WALL VENTS THROUGHOUT. | 56. ADEQUATE VENTILATION & LIGHTING; DESIGNATED AREAS USED - Comments: MUST REPLACE BURNT OUT LIGHTS IN WALK IN COOLER,REAR STORAGE AREA,REAR PREP AREA AND WHERE NEEDED.MUST PROVIDE LIGHT SHIELDS IN FRONT HOT/DELI PREP AREA,WALK IN COOLERS. | 57. ALL FOOD EMPLOYEES HAVE FOOD HANDLER TRAINING - Comments: OBSERVED NO FOOD HANDLERS TRAINING FOR EMPLOYEE.MUST PROVIDE AND MAINTAIN.

values.name: CAFECITO
values.violations: 5. PROCEDURES FOR RESPONDING TO VOMITING AND DIARRHEAL EVENTS - Comments: FOUND PROCEDURE/PLAN ON SITE HOWEVER KIT NOT COMPLETE MISSING SOLUTION TO CONTROL NOROVIRUS FOR RESPONDING TO VOMITING AND DIARRHEAL EVENTS, ALSO MISSING MOP ETC. INSTRUCTED FACILITY TO MAINTAIN ANY APPROPRIATE SUPPLIES ON SITE. PRIORITY FOUNDATION VIOLATION 7-38-005. - | 8. HANDS CLEAN & PROPERLY WASHED - Comments: OBSERVED EMPLOYEE WRITING DATES  ON PIECE OF PAPER,WENT INSIDE THE WALK-IN COOLER RETURNED TO HIS WORK STATION GRABBED A PAIR GLOVES, GLOVED HIS HANDS A CONTINUE TO SLICE COOKED PEELED RED PEPPERS AND PUT THEM WITH PREVIOUS SLICED PEPPERS.NO HAND WASHING PRIOR TO GLOVE HANDS. HANDWASHING AND GLOVE PROCEDURE WAS DISCUSSED WITH ON DUTY MANAGER, WHICH SHE DISCUSSED ISSUE WITH EMPLOYEE. PRIORITY VIOLATION 7-38-010. | 10. ADEQUATE HANDWASHING SINKS PROPERLY SUPPLIED AND ACCESSIBLE - Comments: NO SOAP PROVIDED AT HAND SOAP DISPENSER BY THE LOW TEMP DISHMACHINE. UPON MY REQUEST MANAGER PROVIDED SOAP AT SOAP DISPENSER, AT SAID MENTION AREA. PRIORITY FOUNDATION:7-38-030(C) | 16. FOOD-CONTACT SURFACES: CLEANED & SANITIZED - Comments: LOW TEMP DISH MACHINE IN PREP AREA, DISPENSING IMPROPER SANITIZER SOLUTION,0ppm. UNIT WAS IN USE,DISH RACK INSIDE WITH UTENSILS. INSTRUCTED TO USE THREE COMPARTENT SINK TO WASH,RINSE AND SANITIZE(100ppm).  TWO DAYS GIVEN VIOLATION:7-38-005. | 23. PROPER DATE MARKING AND DISPOSITION - Comments: OBSERVED PREPARED TCS FOODS NOT PROPERLY DATE LABELED. MUST PROPERLY DATE LABELED FOODS WITH AN EXPIRATION DATE NO LONGER THAN 7 DAYS ON ALL TCS FOODS(COOKED CHICKEN,BOILED DICED POTATOES, SLICED TOMATOES ETC).  PRIORITY FOUNDATION VIOLATION: 7-38-005. | 25. CONSUMER ADVISORY PROVIDED FOR RAW/UNDERCOOKED FOOD - Comments:  MUST PROVIDE CONSUMER ADVISORY (ON SITE), REMINDER (IN THE MENU), AND DISCLOSURE (BY THE FOOD ITEMS) FOR ALL UNDERCOOKED FOODS(EGGS).	ALSO MUST INDICATE ON MENU 'COOK TO ORDER' PHRASE FOR EGGS,STEAKS, ETC.  PRIORITY FOUNDATION VIOLATION:7-38-005.      | 36. THERMOMETERS PROVIDED & ACCURATE - Comments: STEM THERMOMETER TO BE ABLE TO CHECK FOOD TEMPERATURE NOT PROVIDED WAS GIVEN/ POINTED TO A COOK MEAT THERMOMETER. AFTER MY REQUEST AND OVER HALF HOUR LATER EMPLOYEE SHOWED ME A NEW THERMOMETER WHICH HE REMOVED FROM MANUFACTURE CASE. INSTRUCTED TO KEEP STEM THERMOMETER IN PREP AREA TO BE ABLE TO CHECK FOOD TEMPERATURE. PRIORITY FOUNDATION:7-38-005 | 38. INSECTS, RODENTS, & ANIMALS NOT PRESENT - Comments: WE OBSERVED OVER 25 FLYING INSECT IN REAR PREP AREA: ON WALLS AROUND THREE COMPARTMENT SINK,ON WALL BY  MOP SINK,ON WALL BY THE ICE MACHINE AND ON WALL BY ONE COMPARTMENT SINK IN PREP AREA. FLIES INSIDE THE OPENED BAG OF DIRTY CLOTHS STORED IN THE KITCHEN. REMOVE FLYING INSECT,CLEAN AND SANITIZE MENTIONED AREA,ALSO RELOCATE BAG  WITH DIRTY CLOTH OUT OF PREP AREA AND PROVIDE CONTAINER WITH LID. PRIORITY FOUNDATION VIOLATION:7-38-020(A) | 41. WIPING CLOTHS: PROPERLY USED & STORED - Comments: NOTED DIRTY WIPING CLOTH ON PREP TABLE IN THE KITCHEN, NOT PROPERLY STORED.INSTRUCTED TO STORE WIPING CLOTH IN A  BUCKET WITH SANITIZER SOLUTION,WHEN NOT IN USE. | 43. IN-USE UTENSILS: PROPERLY STORED - Comments: ICE SCOOPS WHEN NOT IN USE MUST BE STORED IN ICE SCOOP CONTAINER THROUGHOUT  | 45. SINGLE-USE/SINGLE-SERVICE ARTICLES: PROPERLY STORED & USED - Comments: SINGLE SERVING UTENSILS(PLASTIC UTENSILS)USED  FOR CUSTOMERS MUST BE INVERT,TO MINIMIZE SOURCE OF CONTAMINATION | 51. PLUMBING INSTALLED; PROPER BACKFLOW DEVICES - Comments: LEAKING PIPE UNDER THE HANDWASHING SINK AT FRONT PREP AREA BY THE DOOR,REPAIR CAUSE | 55. PHYSICAL FACILITIES INSTALLED, MAINTAINED & CLEAN - Comments: DUST BUILD-UP ON CEILING VENT COVER BY THE ICE MACHINE. CLEAN AND REPAIR | 57. ALL FOOD EMPLOYEES HAVE FOOD HANDLER TRAINING - Comments: NO FOOD HANDLER TRAINING CERTIFICATE PROVIDED ON SITE.INSTRUCTED TO PROVIDE.  | 58. ALLERGEN TRAINING AS REQUIRED - Comments: TWO CITY SANITATION CERTIFICATE PROVIDED ON SITE,HOWEVER ONE ALLERGEN TRAINING CERTIFICATE PROVIDE. ADDITIONAL ALLERGEN CERTIFICATE IS NEEDED
